rules.title: Rules and Terms of Use
rules.subtitle: This is an adults-only space. By accessing, you confirm you are 18+ years old and agree to comply with the following rules designed to ensure a safe, respectful, and professional environment.

respect.title: Respect and Coexistence
respect.description: We treat all people with dignity and respect. Any form of discrimination, harassment, insults, or hostile behavior towards other users is strictly prohibited.

details.0: Offensive comments based on gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, or nationality will not be tolerated
details.1: Harassment, stalking, or intimidation will result in immediate ban
details.2: Criticism must be constructive and never personal
details.3: Respect each person's decisions and boundaries

adults.title: Adults Only Content (+18)
adults.description: This site is exclusively for people 18 years or older. By registering, you declare under oath that you meet this requirement.

details.0: Sharing content involving minors in any form is prohibited
details.2: Administrators may request age verification at any time

content.title: Permitted Content
content.description: All content must be related to the forum's purpose: sharing experiences, reviews, and professional escort services in a respectful manner.

details.0: Spam, unauthorized advertising, or promotion of external services is not allowed
details.1: Posts of illegal content under international laws are prohibited
details.2: Reviews must be honest and based on real experiences
details.3: Requests or offers of services that violate the law are not permitted

privacy.title: Privacy and Personal Data
privacy.description: We protect the privacy of all users. Sharing personal information of third parties without their consent is strictly prohibited.

details.0: Do not post phone numbers, addresses, or personal data of others
details.1: Do not share private conversations without authorization
details.2: Do not attempt to identify or dox other users
details.3: Use private forum areas for sensitive information

safety.title: Personal Safety
safety.description: Your safety is a priority. We recommend practicing safe meetings and never sharing information that could compromise your integrity.

details.0: Always verify identity before in-person meetings
details.1: Inform someone you trust about your activities
details.2: Do not share sensitive financial information
details.3: Report any suspicious or risky situation

verification.title: Verification System
verification.description: We offer a voluntary verification system to increase trust in the community. Verified users have access to exclusive areas.

details.0: Verification is confidential and data is protected
details.1: Verified profiles receive a visible badge
details.2: You can request verification at any time

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: This forum operates in compliance with applicable laws. No illegal activity is permitted.

details.0: Human trafficking or any form of exploitation is prohibited
details.1: Services involving drugs or illegal substances are not allowed
details.2: We comply with data protection laws
details.3: We cooperate with authorities when legally required

noExploitation.title: Zero Tolerance for Exploitation
noExploitation.description: We have a zero-tolerance policy towards any form of human trafficking, exploitation, or coercion. Report any suspicion immediately.

details.0: Report any indication of exploitation or trafficking
details.1: Third-party posts without verifiable consent are not allowed
details.2: We actively collaborate with anti-trafficking organizations

discretion.title: Discretion and Confidentiality
discretion.description: We value discretion. What is shared in the forum should remain in the forum.

details.0: Do not share forum content on social media without authorization
details.1: Respect the confidentiality of other users
details.2: Unauthorized screenshots may result in ban

reports.title: Reports and Moderation
reports.description: If you find content that violates the rules, report it immediately. Our moderation team reviews each case confidentially.

details.0: Use the report button for inappropriate content
details.3: You can contact moderators directly for urgent cases

warning.title: Consequences of Non-Compliance
warning.description: Violations of these rules will result in actions that may include: warning, temporary suspension, permanent ban, report to authorities (in cases of illegal activity), and removal of all associated content.

report.title: Report
report.detailsPlaceholder: Provide more details about the report...
report.successDesc: Thank you for helping keep the community safe
report.helpCommunity: Help us keep the community safe. Select the reason for reporting.
report.reportSuccessDesc: Our team will review your report soon

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.s1p: At TS Rating, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our platform.
privacyPage.s21p: When you create an account, we collect:
privacyPage.s23p: We store all content you publish:
privacyPage.s3items: Provide and maintain our service|Create and manage your account|Personalize your experience|Communicate with you|Moderate content|Prevent fraud and abuse
privacyPage.s4p: We process your personal information under the following legal bases:
privacyPage.s4i1: Consent: You have given your consent when registering
privacyPage.s4i2: Contract: Necessary to provide the service
privacyPage.s4i3: Legitimate interest: To improve and secure the platform
privacyPage.s4i4: Legal obligation: To comply with applicable laws
privacyPage.s5p: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
privacyPage.s5i1: Other users: Your public profile and content are visible
privacyPage.s5i2: Service providers: Supabase, email services, analytics
privacyPage.s5i3: Legal authorities: When required by law
privacyPage.s6items: Password encryption|Secure HTTPS connections|Row Level Security in database|Two-factor authentication|Regular audits|Encrypted backups
privacyPage.s7p: We keep your information as long as your account is active or as needed.
privacyPage.s7note: You can request deletion of your account at any time.
privacyPage.s8note: To exercise these rights, contact us through our contact page.
privacyPage.s9p: We use cookies and similar technologies. See our Cookie Policy for more details.
privacyPage.s10p: TS Rating is intended for people over 18 years of age.
privacyPage.s11p: Your data may be transferred to servers outside your country, in compliance with applicable laws.
privacyPage.s12p: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally.
privacyPage.s13p: If you have questions, you can contact us through the
privacyPage.importantNote: This is a community for trans professionals. We treat your information with the utmost respect and confidentiality.

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.s1p: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
cookiesPage.s2p: TS Rating uses cookies to improve your browsing experience, understand how you interact with our site, and personalize the content displayed.
cookiesPage.s31purpose: Purpose: Essential for the site to function
cookiesPage.s31desc: These cookies are necessary for you to browse the site and use its basic features.
cookiesPage.s31note: ‚úì These cookies do not require consent under applicable legislation
cookiesPage.s32purpose: Purpose: Remember your preferences and personalize your experience
cookiesPage.s32desc: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices and provide more personalized features.
cookiesPage.s33purpose: Purpose: Understand how visitors use the site
cookiesPage.s33desc: These cookies collect aggregated and anonymous information about how visitors use the website.
cookiesPage.s4p: In some cases, we use cookies provided by trusted third parties:
cookiesPage.s4i1: Supabase: For authentication and database management
cookiesPage.s4i3: Analytics services: To understand user behavior
cookiesPage.s4note: These third parties have their own privacy policies.
cookiesPage.s5p: TS Rating uses two types of cookies based on their duration:
cookiesPage.s5i1: Session cookies: Temporary and deleted when you close your browser.
cookiesPage.s5i2: Persistent cookies: Remain on your device for up to 1-2 years or until you delete them.
cookiesPage.s6p: You can manage or delete cookies according to your preferences.
cookiesPage.s61p: All modern browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings.
cookiesPage.s61i2: Accept only cookies from specific sites
cookiesPage.s61links: Links to cookie management instructions by browser:
cookiesPage.s62p: When you visit TS Rating for the first time, you will see a cookie banner where you can accept or reject non-essential cookies.
cookiesPage.s7p: If you choose to block or delete cookies, some parts of the site may not work correctly:
cookiesPage.s7i1: You won't be able to stay logged in
cookiesPage.s7i2: You will lose your language and theme preferences
cookiesPage.s7i3: Some personalized features won't be available
cookiesPage.s7i4: The user experience may be affected
cookiesPage.s7note: Note: Strictly necessary cookies cannot be disabled.
cookiesPage.s8p: Some browsers include a "Do Not Track" feature. We respect your privacy and work to improve our tracking practices.
cookiesPage.s9p: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.
cookiesPage.s10p: For more information about cookies and how to manage them, visit:
cookiesPage.s11p: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, you can contact us through our
cookiesPage.summaryI1: ‚úì We use cookies to improve your experience
cookiesPage.summaryI2: ‚úì Some cookies are essential for the site to function
cookiesPage.summaryI3: ‚úì You can manage cookies through your browser or our banner
cookiesPage.summaryI4: ‚úì We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about TS Rating
faq.q1: How do I register on the forum?
faq.a1: To register, click the "Sign up" button in the top right corner. Fill out the form with your email, username and password. You'll receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
faq.q2: How can I verify my account?
faq.a2: Go to the Verification section in your profile. Follow the steps: generate your unique code, take a photo showing the code, and upload the image. Our team will review your request within 24-48 hours.
faq.q3: What are the benefits of verification?
faq.a3: Verified accounts have access to private forum sections, a visible badge on their profile, greater community trust and priority support.
faq.q4: How can I report inappropriate content?
faq.a4: Each post has a "Report" button. Click it, select the reason and provide additional details if needed.
faq.a5: For security and traceability reasons, the username cannot be changed once the account is created.
faq.q6: How does the private messaging system work?
faq.a6: You can send private messages to any registered user. Go to the user's profile and click "Send message", or access your message inbox from the user menu.
faq.a7: Points accumulate from your activity on the forum. Reactions are ways to interact with other users' posts.
faq.q8: How can I delete my account?
faq.a8: You can request account deletion from settings. Your personal information will be removed, but your posts will remain anonymously.
faq.q9: What if I forgot my password?
faq.a9: On the login page, click "Forgot your password?". Enter your email and you'll receive a link to reset your password.
faq.a10: VIP status is granted to outstanding community members. Contact the admin team for more information.
faq.q11: How do I create a self-promotion thread?
faq.a11: To create a self-promotion thread you must be verified as an escort. First, verify your account as an escort. Once verified, go to the country where you offer your services, click on the Self-Promotion section at the top of the country page, and create your thread selecting the corresponding city. Only verified escorts, administrators and moderators can create threads in self-promotion. Regular users can comment but not create threads.
faq.q12: How do I get verified as an escort?
faq.a12: Go to the Verification page and select Escort Verification. You'll need to generate a unique code, write it on a piece of paper along with your username and today's date, take a photo holding it, and upload the image. The moderation team will review your request within 24-48 hours. Once approved, you'll receive the Verified Escort badge and will be able to create self-promotion threads on tsrating.com.
